title: [13w39b][1.7]看！灰机！
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
存档下载：http://www.doofmars.de/dl/Airplane.zip

原理：3辆命令方块矿车并排，两两之间有1格间隔

第一个命令方块矿车的命令：

summon MinecartRideable ~ ~4 ~ {

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~4 85",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~2 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~-7 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~-9 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~1 ~-10 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~0 ~4 85",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~0 ~3 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~0 ~2 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~0 ~2 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~0 ~2 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~0 ~-6 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~0 ~-6 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~0 ~-6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~0 ~-10 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-2 ~2 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-2 ~1 152",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-2 ~-6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-2 ~-7 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~4 85",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~2 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~1 157",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~-6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~-1 ~-8 0",

Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.2]}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
第二个命令方块矿车的命令：
summon MinecartRideable ~ ~4 ~ {

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~3 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~4 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~5 ~-1 ~3 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~5 ~0 ~3 85",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-2 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-3 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-4 ~-1 ~4 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-5 ~-1 ~3 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-5 ~0 ~3 85",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~-1 ~-4 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~-1 ~1 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~3 ~-1 ~1 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~4 ~-1 ~1 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~5 ~-1 ~2 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~5 ~0 ~2 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~-4 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-2 ~-1 ~1 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-3 ~-1 ~1 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-4 ~-1 ~1 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-5 ~-1 ~2 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-5 ~0 ~2 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~-1 ~6 85",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~-1 ~5 0",

Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.2]}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
第三个命令方块矿车的命令：
summon MinecartRideable ~ ~4 ~ {

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~3 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~4 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~5 ~1 ~5 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-2 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-3 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-4 ~1 ~6 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-5 ~1 ~5 5",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~1 ~-2 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~1 ~-2 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~3 ~1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~4 ~1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~5 ~1 ~4 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-2 ~1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-3 ~1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-4 ~1 ~3 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-5 ~1 ~4 0",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~1 ~8 85",

Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~-1 ~1 ~7 0",

Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.2]}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}

[Edit] Formatting复制代码

（我不生产水，我只是大自然的搬运工。所以搞不出来别问我！！！！）
